node.title: Ex-fugitive paedophile sentenced to nine years in jail for child sex abuse after decade on the run
node.alt: A man wearing a hat sits at an outdoors table surrounded by food and drink
node.description: Former Broome tour operator and international fugitive Charles Batham is handed a nine-year prison term for abusing two girls in WA's Kimberley, after fleeing Australia a decade ago.
node.content:
["The long-running saga of former fugitive and aviator Charles Batham has come to an end after he was\u00a0sentenced to nine\u00a0years in jail for sexually abusing two girls in Broome.", "The 77-year-old Englishman fled Australia in 2011 after being charged with more than 30\u00a0child sex offences in WA's Kimberley.", "He was arrested in Italy and extradited during the peak of the COVID-19 pandemic, after an ABC investigation triggered sightings and tip-offs from across Europe.", "In June, the aviator pleaded guilty to\u00a031\u00a0charges, including sexual penetration of a child under 13\u00a0and indecently recording a child under 13, although two charges have since been withdrawn.", "", "
Charles Batham pictured in Broome in 2007, four years before he fled overseas.(Supplied: Youtube )
", "His two victims were aged between 8 and 12 when the abuse occurred.", "In the Perth District Court on Tuesday morning, Judge Lisa Tovey described Batham's offending\u00a0as sustained and aggravated and sentenced him to nine\u00a0years and two months\u00a0in jail.", "
Abuse no aberration: judge
", "Judge Tovey also\u00a0rejected Batham's claims the abuse was an aberration.\u00a0", "", "
Batham was well-known in Broome where he ran an ultra-light aeroplane tour company.(ABC News)
", "\"I do not accept that your behaviour was out of character,\" she said.\u00a0", "\"In my view your offending was sustained \u2026 not a short-term lapse of judgement. \"", "As the judge continued her comments, Batham interrupted to say he was hard of hearing.", "Judge Tovey continued in a louder voice, saying:\u00a0\"The only person whose fault this is, is you.\u00a0The only person who should feel ashamed is you.\"", "Mr Batham exclaimed \"absolutely\" as she spoke the words.\u00a0", "
Girls abused after babysitting offer\u00a0
", "The court heard the offences were committed between 2006\u00a0and 2011, when Batham was living in a hangar near Broome International Airport.", "At the time he was a well-known face around town, running a business called Broome Trike flights that took tourists on ultra-light plane flights over Cable Beach.", "", "
Batham piloting an ultra-light aircraft flight over the town of Broome\u00a0prior to his arrest.(Supplied)
", "The court heard Batham befriended the families of the two girls he went on to molest, offering to babysit them at the converted double-decker bus he kept parked at the hangar.", "Hundreds of child exploitation images were found at the aircraft hangar.", "Some images were very explicit, showing Batham sexually abusing one of his victims, who was aged 8 and 9 at the time.", "
Victim 'will not forgive or forget'
", "One of Batham's victims delivered her victim impact statement via video link from interstate.", "She described the trauma caused, most significantly that it had led to an ongoing fear of her own young children being molested.", "\"The weight of it all keeps me up at night.\u00a0I will not forgive or forget what he's done.\"", "Batham's second victim said in a statement\u00a0the abuse had haunted her into adulthood.", "\"I felt so disgusting. The moment I'd close my eyes, the memories would come back,\" she wrote.", "\"Even when he's in jail I feel scared. I'm worried he might break out and stalk me.", "\"It makes me so sick and angry that I can't eat or sleep.\"", "
Remorse claim rejected by judge
", "The court heard\u00a0Batham left a letter with a friend in Broome, explaining his sudden departure and referring to\u00a0having \"made stupid mistakes\".", "The friend took the letter to police as they set about trying to track him overseas.", "", "
Batham was extradited from Italy in November 2020, in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic.\u00a0(Suppled: WA Police)
", "Defence lawyer Darryl Ryan said Batham was deeply remorseful, something that Judge Tovey challenged.", "She said Batham\u2019s letter to the court expressed shame, but not remorse.", "She also expressed doubt about a submission that Batham, while on the run, had only changed his name in England to honour his mother and take on her maiden name, rather than to evade capture.", "Prosecutor Michael Cvetskoksi also rejected the claims of remorse\u00a0and said\u00a0Batham had repeatedly put his own \"perverted sexual needs\" ahead of the wellbeing of the girls.", "Referring to the second victim, who endured the more sustained and serious abuse, Mr Cvetskoksi said Batham \"trained her to be his sex toy over a longer period of time\".", "
Mysteries remain about decade on the run
", "Question marks remain over many aspects of Batham's escape and capture.", "He made one brief court appearance in January 2011 after Broome detectives searched his property and seized computers.", "He was charged with exposing a child under 13 to indecent matter and possessing child exploitation material, and the ABC understands he was not required to surrender his passport when he was released on bail.", "By the time the dozens of more serious charges were added, he had fled overseas, flying first to Perth and then on to Malaysia.\u00a0", "", "
Authorities were alerted to the whereabouts of Batham,\u00a0seen here socialising in Turkey, after an ABC\u00a0investigation.(Supplied: Facebook)
", "A bench warrant was issued after he failed to appear in court in February 2011, and Batham was added to\u00a0Interpol's\u00a0Ref Alert database, requiring he be detained if identified overseas.", "But documents obtained by the ABC show he moved with relative ease around Europe, obtaining a new British passport under the name Charles Edwin Shannon and booking flights to the US.", "He even turned up in online news stories in Italy prior to his arrest, after getting into a dispute with aviation authorities.", "It was not until an ABC investigation was published in February 2020 that the case was reactivated, with shocked acquaintances in Turkey and Italy making contact to report his whereabouts.", "
"]
